channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Princess Ahanonu
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Princess Ahanonu

item.title: Project 1: Movie Recommendation Engine
item.description: Created a tool that recommends movies to concerned users Scraped the details of IMDB Top 1000 most popular movies using python and beautifulsoup Analysed data and got relevant insights such as the most profitable genres, most popular movies and IMDB’s gross profit for english and foreign movies Engineered features from the details of each movie to try to find similar movies for users based on users past preferences. After which, the engine provides recommendations to the user

item.title: Project 2: Popular Female Fitness Youtubers Analysis
item.description: Performed an exploratory analysis on 7 of the most popular female fitness trainers on youtube Scraped all youtube content details and descriptions for all youtubers using the youtube API and JSON converter Built multiple graphs that generates insights into the ongoings of each fitness youtuber and their growth in the field Comparison of the subscriber count of each youtuber Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 3: EDA of Nigerian Education with Visualizations
item.description: Performed an extensive exploratory analysis into the depth of education in Nigeria based on its educational facilities Made valuable insights into Nigeria’s education system such as the areas and school managements with predicted lower and higher levels of education. Comparison of the qualification levels of the different nigerian education managements Made use of matplotlib and seaborn to make visualizations and pandas and numpy for analysis and exploration Built eye catching visualizations with Tableau showing insights

item.title: Project 4: Web Scraping Goodreads romcom section
item.description: Perfected my web scraping skills by scraping content from goodreads (a book review site) Obtained titles, authors, rating, and description of all books in the romcom genre through multiple pages of the site Made use of python and beautiful soup as well as requests Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 5: Sentiment Analysis on Elon Musk Tweets
item.description: Created a sentiment analysis on all elon musk tweets Made use of python, textblob and seaborn to create interactive visualizations Discovered a pattern in the tweets and dare I say into the inner workings of the mind of Elon Musk?… based on his tweets anyway Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: About
item.description: Data Science and Analytics are my passion. My name is Princess Ahanonu and I have been immersed in the data science field for the last 2 years. I have data science and analysis certifications from notable companies such as IBM and Google. When I was first starting out my data science journey I was extremely lost. Where to start from, what to read, which resources to actually concentrate on; these where some of the multiple challenges I faced on this journey.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Find me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/princess-ahanonu/ GitHub: https://github.com/rou-va Medium: https://medium.com/@ahanonuprincess1 Twitter: https://twitter.com/princess2476

item.title: Project 6: Data Analyis of Trending YouTube Comments Statistics
item.description: Cleaned data set to ensure correct values and accuracy of analysis Ensured data fields were complete and filled with values as well as consistent and up to date Removed all duplicated values and data containing allowable values improving its validity Performed an exploration into the dataset making use of python and its libraries Performed sentiment analysis on the data Derived insights into the idea of a popular comment… what makes a comment popular?
